title: Temporal
description: Ever wondered where your team members are or if you have enough people for upcoming shifts? Worried about vacations clashing with project schedules? We felt the same, so we built Temporal. It's your go-to solution for capacity planning and scheduling, enhancing team coordination with real-time visibility of availability, project transparency, and efficient resource allocation. Temporal improves workload management, and ensures you're never caught off-guard by staffing issues.
